object.text: (Backup available only if ROM doesn't share kernel with Internal)
Force using generic screen drawing code
Press and hold volume up or down
during boot to enter the MultiROM menu.
MultiROM will remember the last ROM
you've booted and auto-boot it on next
reboot, unless you select different one.
Only works with ROMs in internal memory.
Set new name for Internal ROM
Set up the size of disk images.
size of the image is limited to 4095MB.

object.text: Copy secondary ROM to primary slot

Select secondary ROM to swap with:
tw_multirom_roms

object.text: This action will create a copy of your current
This action will remove your current
primary ROM and then add it to secondary ROMs.
You can choose name of this new ROM below.
Select secondary ROM to swap primary with.
Select secondary ROM to copy into primary slot.
MultiROM - Swap ROMs - Set new ROM's name
